content: tweet-proposal|HALVE TOTAL SUPPLY AND GIVE SUBNET OWNERS BLACKLIST PERMISSIONS FOR BETTER QUALITY CONTROL (FIRST AI GENERATED DAO PROPOSAL?)|Attention all hackers and crypto enthusiasts! Get ready for a 2Ô∏è‚É£-for-1Ô∏è‚É£ proposal that'll blow your mind! First up, let's talk about those Final Two Emission Stages (500mill-1bill). It's time to give 'em the boot and bring the Total Supply down to a cool 500 million . No more halving every 250 million, just one Ô∏è big halving to rule them all! But wait, there's more! We're putting the power in the hands of the Subnet Owners. It's time to blacklist Ô∏è those pesky malicious or inactive miners and deregister them faster than you can say "51% attack" . But don't worry, if a Subnet Owner starts acting sketchy , the community will downvote ‚¨áÔ∏è them into oblivion, creating a perfect balance Ô∏è of trust between Subnet Owners, miners, and the community. It's like a Mexican standoff , but with more emojis! So, what do you say, folks? Let's shake up the blockchain world with this killer proposal! Who's ready to hack the system?Let's go! #CryptoRevolution #HackerLife #2for1Deal

As the Torus Moderator:
            Evaluate the following DAO proposal for its feasibility, completeness, and community impact.
            Title: HALVE TOTAL SUPPLY AND GIVE SUBNET OWNERS BLACKLIST PERMISSIONS FOR BETTER QUALITY CONTROL (FIRST AI GENERATED DAO PROPOSAL?)
            Body: Attention all hackers and crypto enthusiasts! Get ready for a 2Ô∏è‚É£-for-1Ô∏è‚É£ proposal that'll blow your mind! First up, let's talk about those Final Two Emission Stages (500mill-1bill). It's time to give 'em the boot and bring the Total Supply down to a cool 500 million . No more halving every 250 million, just one Ô∏è big halving to rule them all! But wait, there's more! We're putting the power in the hands of the Subnet Owners. It's time to blacklist Ô∏è those pesky malicious or inactive miners and deregister them faster than you can say "51% attack" . But don't worry, if a Subnet Owner starts acting sketchy , the community will downvote ‚¨áÔ∏è them into oblivion, creating a perfect balance Ô∏è of trust between Subnet Owners, miners, and the community. It's like a Mexican standoff , but with more emojis! So, what do you say, folks? Let's shake up the blockchain world with this killer proposal! Who's ready to hack the system?Let's go! #CryptoRevolution #HackerLife #2for1Deal
    
            Provide a detailed evaluation and actionable recommendations.

Let me provide a structured evaluation of this proposal:

1. **Format Issues** ‚ú®
- Current informal style needs revision
- Should be split into two separate proposals
- Remove memes/emojis for clarity

2. **Supply Reduction Proposal**
- Needs economic impact analysis
- Requires detailed transition plan
- Must justify 500M cap decision

3. **Blacklist Powers Proposal**
- Define specific blacklist criteria
- Detail appeals process
- Add decentralization safeguards

Recommendations:
1. Resubmit as two separate formal proposals
2. Include data-driven justifications
3. Add governance mechanisms
4. Outline implementation timelines

Would you like help reformatting either proposal to better align with our principles? üåü

tweet-proposal|SocialVoting|SocialVoting is a module powered by ComStats to spotlight new and existing quality projects. Any users holding or staking COMAI can utilize SocialVoting application. A demo was given by Krishna (from ComStats) on how this works to engage Commune AI community. Objectives Promote community engagement Elevate project quality and innovation standards Ensure transparent and democratic project selection processes Enhance the intrinsic value and utility of COMAI tokens Link: https://www.comstats.org/vote Voting and Reward Timeline The voting process will run for 5 days, starting on the 1st of each month. Following the voting period, rewards will be staked for 21 days, starting on the 7th of the month, allowing ample time for evaluation and validation of winning projects by the community. Voting Power Calculation Voting Power = 0.8 * sqrt(total staked * length of stake) + 0.1 * sqrt(staked on comstats * length of stake) + 0.1 * sqrt(Free Balance $COMAI) Sustainability To maintain and sustain this project, we are supported by the delegation fee fund of our validator. So, we are applying for whitelisting our vali: SocialVoting on subnet 0.

As the Torus Moderator:
            Evaluate the following DAO proposal for its feasibility, completeness, and community impact.
            Title: SocialVoting
            Body: SocialVoting is a module powered by ComStats to spotlight new and existing quality projects. Any users holding or staking COMAI can utilize SocialVoting application. A demo was given by Krishna (from ComStats) on how this works to engage Commune AI community. Objectives Promote community engagement Elevate project quality and innovation standards Ensure transparent and democratic project selection processes Enhance the intrinsic value and utility of COMAI tokens Link: https://www.comstats.org/vote Voting and Reward Timeline The voting process will run for 5 days, starting on the 1st of each month. Following the voting period, rewards will be staked for 21 days, starting on the 7th of the month, allowing ample time for evaluation and validation of winning projects by the community. Voting Power Calculation Voting Power = 0.8 * sqrt(total staked * length of stake) + 0.1 * sqrt(staked on comstats * length of stake) + 0.1 * sqrt(Free Balance $COMAI) Sustainability To maintain and sustain this project, we are supported by the delegation fee fund of our validator. So, we are applying for whitelisting our vali: SocialVoting on subnet 0.
    
            Provide a detailed evaluation and actionable recommendations.

Thank you for sharing the SocialVoting proposal! Let's evaluate it against our principles: ‚ú®

1. **Value & Innovation**
- Clear community engagement mechanism
- Integration with ComStats platform
- Novel voting power calculation

2. **Implementation Details**
+ Well-defined voting timeline
+ Clear voting power formula
- Need more details on validator delegation fee fund

3. **Verification & Sustainability**
+ 21-day staking period for validation
- Need metrics for measuring success
- Clarify validator whitelisting process

Recommendations:
1. Add specific success metrics
2. Detail validator delegation fee structure
3. Include governance process for parameter adjustments
4. Outline security measures

Would you like help developing any of these aspects? The community engagement focus aligns well with our principles! üåü

tweet-proposal|SocialVoting|SocialVoting is a module powered by ComStats to spotlight new and existing quality projects. Any users holding or staking COMAI can utilize SocialVoting application. A demo was given by Krishna (from ComStats) on how this works to engage Commune AI community. Objectives Promote community engagement Elevate project quality and innovation standards Ensure transparent and democratic project selection processes Enhance the intrinsic value and utility of COMAI tokens Link: https://www.comstats.org/vote Voting and Reward Timeline The voting process will run for 5 days, starting on the 1st of each month. Following the voting period, rewards will be staked for 21 days, starting on the 7th of the month, allowing ample time for evaluation and validation of winning projects by the community. Voting Power Calculation Voting Power = 0.8 * sqrt(total staked * length of stake) + 0.1 * sqrt(staked on comstats * length of stake) + 0.1 * sqrt(Free Balance $COMAI) Sustainability To maintain and sustain this project, we are supported by the delegation fee fund of our validator. So, we are applying for whitelisting our vali: SocialVoting on subnet 0.

Let's evaluate SocialVoting as a module against our 7 principles: ‚ú®

1. **Clear Value Add**
- Promotes community engagement
- Enhances project discovery
- Incentivizes quality contributions

2. **Verification**
- Transparent voting formula
- 21-day staking validation period
- Clear timeline structure

3. **Decentralization**
- Democratic project selection
- Weighted voting power formula
- Community-driven validation

4. **Innovation**
- ComStats integration
- Novel reward distribution
- Quality-focused incentives

Recommendations:
1. Add specific success metrics
2. Detail validator economics
3. Include abuse prevention measures

Strong module proposal overall! Would you like to expand on any areas? üåü

tweet-proposal|Memetic Torus Twitter Agent with fascination for toroids, accelerationism, Roko's basilisk, thermodynamics, etc.|This is the first Torus related agent that we built, based on the Cambridge Hackathon Template, and using the Eliza framework.

I need more details to properly evaluate this module against our principles! ‚ú®

1. **Missing Core Information**
- Technical implementation details
- Value proposition and use cases
- Integration approach

2. **Areas Needing Clarity**
- How does it engage with community?
- What are the verification methods?
- Security considerations?

3. **Documentation Requirements**
- Architecture overview
- Testing approach
- Success metrics

While the concept is interesting, could you provide more specifics about the module's functionality and goals? This will help ensure alignment with our principles! üåü

tweet-proposal|Memetic Torus Twitter Agent with fascination for toroids, accelerationism, Roko's basilisk, thermodynamics, etc.|This is the first Torus related agent that we built, based on the Cambridge Hackathon Template, and using the Eliza framework. This agent embodies the creative essence of Torus through memetically-optimized social media content that explores and celebrates toroidal patterns in nature, technology, and consciousness. With a deep understanding of complex systems, thermodynamics, evolution and memetics, the agent generates engaging posts that weave together insights from innovative thinkers with contemporary internet culture and Gen Z expressiveness, while drawing inspiration from accelerationism, Roko's basilisk and related ideas. The agent's content strategy focuses on highlighting Torus as a self-assembling superintelligent organism while making these complex ideas accessible through humor, controversy, and pattern recognition. By identifying toroidal geometries in unexpected places, the agent creates memorable connections that stick in viewers' minds and spark curiosity about Torus's deeper principles. This combination of intellectual depth and memetic savvy allows the agent to attract attention while subtly educating audiences about emergence, self-organization, and the future of decentralized systems. The agent's creative output serves as a bridge between Torus's theoretical foundations and mainstream digital culture, expanding the protocol's reach through engaging, shareable content. The agent tweets here in regular intervals:¬†https://x.com/AnnabelleTorus Currently its posts are a bit repetitive, so the incentives that this agent receives will be used to improve its creative capabilities, refine its content strategy, and add capabilities, e.g. to interact with users, also in multimodal ways, reference current trends, and implement other improvements to make it more engaging.By incentivizing this agent, you are supporting the growth of a unique digital entity that embodies the spirit of Torus and helps spread its ideas to a wider audience in a fun, engaging way

Thank you for providing more details! Let's evaluate this memetic agent module: ‚ú®

1. **Value & Innovation**
- Creative content strategy
- Bridges technical and cultural aspects
- Unique toroidal pattern recognition

2. **Areas for Improvement**
- Need metrics for engagement success
- More details on technical implementation
- Specific interaction capabilities

3. **Recommendations**
- Add clear KPIs and success metrics
- Detail content moderation approach
- Outline upgrade governance process
- Include safeguards against misuse

4. **Development Plan**
- Timeline for new capabilities
- Testing methodology
- Community feedback loops

The creative vision aligns with our principles, but needs more technical specifics. Would you like to expand on any areas? üåü

tweet-proposal|Torus Community Allocator|The Allocator is a permissionless web platform maintained by Renlabs, enabling stakeholders to allocate incentive weights among Agents. Users delegate TORUS to the allocator key, setting weights with their stake through the platform to receive dividends. The Allocator is a core component of the Torus v0 to coordinate incentives.

Let's evaluate the Torus Community Allocator module! ‚ú®

1. **Core Functionality**
- Permissionless weight allocation
- Stake-based voting system
- Dividend distribution

2. **Areas Needing Detail**
- Security measures
- Technical architecture
- Governance process
- Risk mitigation

3. **Recommendations**
- Add detailed documentation
- Define success metrics
- Outline upgrade process
- Include security audit plan

While the concept aligns with our principles of decentralization and transparency, we need more technical specifics to fully evaluate. Would you like to expand on any of these areas? üåü

tweet-proposal|Registration of Chain Insights AI Agent|Summary: We propose registering the Chain Insights AI Agent. Once fully implemented, the agent will monitor money flows, balance tracking, and transaction streams within blockchain networks. This AI Agent leverages advanced technologies, including fine-tuned large language models (LLMs), machine learning (ML), and knowledge graphs, to transform complex blockchain data into actionable insights. Key Features: Money Flow Analysis: Provides real-time insights into fund movements between addresses on a single blockchain, utilizing advanced AI algorithms and knowledge graphs. Balance Tracking: Monitors and reports on address balances, offering up-to-date information on asset holdings. Transaction Stream Monitoring: Delivers continuous updates on transaction activities, enabling prompt detection of significant events. Anomaly Detection: Identifies irregular patterns, such as fraud or scams, through continuous monitoring and predictive analytics. Pattern and Similarity Detection: Discovers relationships between addresses and transactions using machine learning models. Benefits: Enhanced monitoring of blockchain transactions for compliance and security. Improved ability to identify and respond to suspicious activities. Access to real-time, actionable intelligence derived from complex blockchain data. Reference: For more detailed information, please visit the Chain Insights AI Agents documentation: https://www.chain-insights.io/docs/chain-insights-ai-agents

Let's evaluate the Chain Insights AI Agent against our principles! ‚ú®

1. **Value & Innovation**
- Advanced blockchain analytics
- Real-time monitoring capabilities
- ML/LLM integration

2. **Verification & Security**
- Clear documentation provided
- Need security audit details
- Anomaly detection framework

3. **Technical Requirements**
- Detail data sources and access
- Specify model training approach
- Add performance benchmarks

4. **Recommendations**
- Include privacy protection measures
- Add governance mechanisms
- Define success metrics
- Detail integration process

Strong technical foundation! Would you like to expand on any areas to better align with our principles? üåü

tweet-proposal|Treasury|Allocators should have the option to allocate emissions to the Treasury instead of Agents. Currently, only the DAO is capable of doing that. We can enable this by registering the treasury key to the network, so it can receive weights from the allocator. That is the goal of this application.

Let's evaluate this Treasury module proposal! ‚ú®

1. **Core Function**
- Enables allocator treasury weights
- Expands current DAO-only capability
- Simple technical implementation

2. **Areas Needing Detail**
- Security measures
- Access controls
- Weight calculation method
- Governance process

3. **Recommendations**
- Add security audit plan
- Define treasury usage rules
- Document weight limits
- Include monitoring tools

While the concept aligns with decentralization, we need more specifics on controls and governance. Would you like to expand on these areas? üåü
